icy cave.death_message: The ledge here is covered in ice, but I think I can make it
icy cave.success_message: I found something buried in the ice
messages: Cavediving is hard enough when it's warm
Almost slipped but I caught myself
I'll be honest, the light makes some of this ice really pretty

frozen lake.death_message: Ok, that was definitely creaking, maybe cracking, I'll just... back up... slowly...
messages: Did the ice just creak?
I hear something skittering on the ice... I hope its just the wind of something
Hope security doesn't find me
Somebody must have burnt some popcorn, ugh, hate when that happens
I know its not what I'm looking for, but I found someone's candy drawer... Jackpot
This is probably nice when its not spooky
This is the second message.
Should've brought a hard hat with me
OSHA would have a field day here.
It's eerily quiet when it snows like this...
I think I see something shining in the snow
Eww, I think I stepped in something... unpleasant
This place reaks. I hope its the dumpster...
Ok, that rat was huge. I'm a little grossed out, but kind of impressed too

cemetary.death_message: Hold on, I think I see someone... I'm going to ask them for help.
cemetary.success_message: I found something scrawled on the back of a gravestone
messages: If I see a ghost, I am running
You know, in a zombie virus outbreak, a cemetary is actually probably pretty safe.

park.death_message: I think someone is following me, I'm going to make a break for it, and see if I can get back to the street
park.success_message: I found something in one of the bushes.
messages: I think I heard there were drug dealers in this park at night
Why do they tell you to stay off the grass in the park. Isn't that kind of the point?
Huh, they have a little dog park area, that's kind of nice

forest cabin.death_message: I found a recorder, some sort of notes from the researcher. I'm going to play it, I'll let you know what it says.
messages: Getting some real Evil Dead vibes here
Why do the crazy researchers always choose the creepiest cabins

OMG IM GONNA DIE...
Never mind... It was a raccoon...
I didn't know we had one of these in the area
I've got to come back when they are open. I could use some relaxation after this case.
